New Records: Karl-Anthony Towns finished with 27 points and 13 rebounds, recording his 31st double-double of the season. Josh Hart had 21 points, 11 rebounds, and seven assists, also recording a double-double. The Knicks snapped their longest losing streak since March 29-April 2, 2024, with the win over the Raptors.
Key Match Events: The Knicks mounted a 19-7 run in the first half, taking control of the game. They also scored 15 unanswered points in the fourth quarter, extending their lead to 112-86 with 2:30 left before the Raptors scored the final 12 points.
Pre-Game Insights: Karl-Anthony Towns, who was listed as questionable after missing Mondayâ€™s game due to a knee injury, returned and played a key role in the Knicks' victory.
Post-Match Reflections: The Knicks snapped their three-game losing streak with the win, marking an important turning point in their season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Knicks have won all five matchups since the trade that sent Anunoby to Toronto in December 2023.
